title: Teen Queen and Has-Beens
description: Lia has everything - a glamorous home and family, good friends, great looks and brains - and she has remained kind and unpretentious in spite of it!However, when after a game of Truth, Dare, Kiss or Promise, she pulls the school heart throb, she alienates 'teen queen' Kaylie who was after Jonno for herself. Kaylie and her friends then start a campaign of bullying against her - the nasty, underhand kind where rumours are spread, threats sent, secrets exposed and confidence undermined. Soon Lia begins to questions her whole life - who she is, why these girls have got it in for her and who her real friends are.
author: Cathy Hopkins
